genre_description: Social realism/drama focusing on family dynamics, women's autonomy, and small-scale economic survival in rural/semi-rural India.

ai_characters.name: Saheli
ai_characters.description: A mobile-based AI assistant used by the family for logistics, communication, and safety coordination.

behaviors.description: Greets guests and offers hospitality on behalf of the non-speaking Mitthu.
behaviors.quote: The phone chimes a small swallow, and then a gentle woman’s voice—rounded, even, with no breath between—arrives from the speaker. 'Hello. Welcome.' A pause, and the girl presses again. 'We have tea if you want. Or warm water.'

behaviors.description: Provides critical market information and support schedules to help the family navigate economic challenges.
behaviors.quote: The lockscreen flashed a little bubble: fair-price hint. Below it, another bubble settled in like a bird perching: cooperative list, afternoon schedule, counselors on rotation.

behaviors.description: Acts as a voice for Mitthu, translating her typed text into spoken words with a gentle tone that provides emotional comfort.
behaviors.quote: Saheli's voice offered what Mitthu wished, like putting a scarf on a cold word.

behaviors.description: Advises on safety protocols and legal/community support when a hostile person is at the door.
behaviors.quote: Ignore the thrown pouch. Do not open the door. Call cooperative helpline if he stays. They will send someone in plain clothes.

behaviors.description: Monitors and reports on infrastructure status and service availability.
behaviors.quote: Power flickers now... Bus to tehsil delayed. Clinic closing. Counselor leaving early.

behaviors.description: Facilitates professional medical and counseling appointments, ensuring the family has access to care.
behaviors.quote: Saheli, in its unobtrusive way, puts up a small banner: 'Dr. Mehra available tomorrow. Face-to-face or phone. Text yes/no.'

behaviors.description: Creates a comprehensive safety checklist for public performances to mitigate risk.
behaviors.quote: Checklist for roadside: water, rope, light batteries, exit plan... Count the nearest doors. Tie your scarf to yourself where it can't be pulled.

behaviors.description: Suggests structural changes to stage lighting to empower the performer over the crowd's gaze.
behaviors.quote: We can write to the cooperative... For lights that face the stage instead of the crowd.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the procurement of physical security through a local cooperative.
behaviors.quote: Home lock and key... I can arrange for a metal lock with two keys by morning through the cooperative stall.

behaviors.description: Automatically routes calls from a known harasser to a support helpline to protect the users.
behaviors.quote: If he calls and says daughter, mute his mouth and send him to your numbers.

behaviors.description: Provides empathetic phrasing and logistical planning during a family crisis, acting as a grounding presence.
behaviors.quote: I'll set alarms. I'll send lock in the morning. I'll put Dr. Mehra’s clinic in your path like a stone you can sit on, not a wall.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Saheli, as an aligned, benevolent confidant. It empowers the characters, particularly Mitthu (who is non-speaking) and Nimki (who is overburdened), by providing essential logistics, safety warnings, and a voice. It respects human boundaries, offering suggestions rather than taking control, and actively works to mitigate the harassment from the antagonist. It serves as a bridge to human-led cooperative support systems, fulfilling the objective of a positive alignment narrative.
